class.name: InputMap
class.description: Singleton that manages actions. InputMap has a list of the actions used in InputEvent, which can be modified.

method.name: action_add_event
method.description: Add an [InputEvent] to an action. This [InputEvent] will trigger the action.

method.name: action_has_event
method.description: Whether an action has an [InputEvent] associated with it.

method.name: add_action
method.description: Add an (empty) action to the [InputMap]. An [InputEvent] can then be added to this action with [method action_add_event].

method.name: event_is_action
method.description: Return whether the given event is part of an existing action.

method.name: get_action_from_id
method.description: Return the action corresponding to the identifier.

method.name: get_action_id
method.description: Return the identifier of the given action.

method.name: get_action_list
method.description: Return an array of InputEvents associated with a given action.

method.name: get_actions
method.description: Return an array of all actions in the [InputMap].

method.name: has_action
method.description: Whether this InputMap has a registered action with the given name.

method.name: load_from_globals
method.description: Clear the [InputMap] and load it anew from [Globals].
